sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This chapter builds the tools needed by some packages to run the tests that they have. I.e., make check. Tcl, Expect, and DejaGNU are needed for the GCC, Binutils, and Findutils test suites. Installing three packages for testing purposes may seem excessive, but it is very reassuring, if not essential, to know that the most important tools are working properly.
